name: Gently Soap
description: By allowing the rapidly growing population of humans with highly sensitive skin and skin conditions to step out from behind the confines of boring, cold, and clinical products - Gently Soap is shattering expectations for gentle, effective body care.
one_liner: By allowing the rapidly growing population of humans with highly sensitive skin and skin conditions to step out from behind the confines of boring, cold, and clinical products - Gently Soap is shattering expectations for gentle, effective body care.
